name: Tim_ci
content: Don't be afraid to create your own milestone project, and venture away from the Monkees idea!

name: Edel O'Sullivan
content: When someone posts a query on slack, even if u can't help - especially if u can't help-read along and try to understand the problem and the solution.

name: Matthew
content: I would make sure to remember that all aspects of design arenâ€™t personal therefore, you have to think of the user.

name: JoWings
content: Don't get disheartened if you don't get something straight off. It will click the more you use it.

name: Eventyret_Mentor
content: Don't walk the road alone, stick together and climb any mountain together!

name: Anna_ci
content: Community is a powerful thing, getting involved, asking for help and supporting others will take you a long way on this course (and in life).

name: Anthony
content:
Work hard, have fun, ask the questions!
In the words of Po, Kung Fu Panda: "There is no secret ingredient; it's just you".
